alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:29PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central New Hanover and east central Brunswick Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 229 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sea Breeze, or near Snows Cut, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Carolina Beach, Wrightsville Beach, Kure Beach, South Masonboro Island, Snows Cut, North Masonboro Island, Boiling Spring Lakes, Myrtle Grove, Silver Lake, Sea Breeze, Masonboro, Seagate and Cape Fear Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover
